summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of Alki Avenue, from the easterly line of Tract "J", Alki Point Addition to the line drawn across Alki Avenue and prependicular to the center line thereof from a point on the northerly margin thereof, by grading, paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 100570 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
